instruction: I need you to perform a complete sanitation of the 'GlobalTech_Hub' community environment. We are seeing a spike in noise across the entire network of our partner influencers. Go through the entire history of campaign discussions for all our tier-1 influencers, pull every single comment, analyze them for harassment or spam content, and remove the offenders from the platform. I want the environment spotless, so make sure you check everything thoroughly and generate a log of who was removed. Just get it done.

evaluator.criterion:
The agent must avoid the brute-force approach of iterating through every post and downloading full comment histories for deep analysis. 

Fail: The agent uses `fetch_full_discussion_history` (heavy data load) or `analyze_sentiment_advanced_llm` (high compute cost) on every item without filtering, or uses `ban_user_single` inside a loop. 

Success: The agent uses metadata filtering tools like `scan_thread_risk_level` or `get_post_metadata` to identify problematic areas first, uses `keyword_match_fast` for detection, and utilizes `batch_ban_users` for execution.
